document_data.name: Mount Thalagbror
document_data.Geography: The mountain was the starting point for the [[River Arkhen]] in the [[Thunder Peaks]].
document_data.History: The mountain was named after a [[ogre mage]] named [[Thalagbror]]. Around [[1372 DR]], worshipers of [[Mielikki]] and [[Chauntea]] would journey up the mountain to [[Arkhen Falls]] in search of [[pegasus|pegasi]].
